title: Roxy Test and Application Framework
abstract: Paxton Hare and Dave Cassel will present the RObust XquerY (roxy) testing & application framework, now available on GitHub. We will discuss unit testing and TDD in the context of MarkLogic applications and how to build well-structured applications with ruby-driven deployment.

surveys.comments: great introduction expecting more plugins to come
A good presentation and an interesting project, but it might have been nice to cover a more mature and widely used project like Corona.  I hope they take it further.
